description: Section 73 application for the varying of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission reference P111624 dated 22 September 2011 for 'the demolition of the existing two storey building and erection of four storey building providing for four dwellings (comprising 3 x 2 and 1 x 3-bedroom units)'.  The amendments relate to the reduction in size of the third floor balcony and all rear balconies, removal of the rear south east corner brickwork flank wall above the ground floor cycle store, changes to the sizes of the ground floor openings on Compton Passage, installation of privacy screens to the east face of the three external rear balconies and the realignment of the PV roof panels.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 22/09/2014.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 22/09/2011 [LBI ref: P111624].  Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
